mapper.select: SELECT i.inventory_id, i.store_id, m.material_id, m.material_name, m.category AS category_code, g.gubn_name AS category_name, i.quantity, m.unit, i.expired_at, i.created_at FROM tbl_inventory i JOIN tbl_material m ON i.material_id = m.material_id LEFT JOIN tbl_gubn g ON m.category = g.gubn_code AND g.group_code = 'material_category' WHERE i.store_id = #{storeId}
